Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.syncing.api.graph

Interface SyncedUniverse

public interface SyncedUniverse
Manages server to client synchronization of a GraphUniverse

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    SyncedUniverse.Builder
    A builder for SyncedUniverses.

  • Method Details

    • getId

      @NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.util.Identifier getId()
      Gets the unique id of this universe.
      Returns:
      this universe's unique id.

    • getUniverse

      @NotNull @NotNull com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.graph.GraphUniverse getUniverse()
      Gets the graph universe that this handler synchronizes.
      Returns:
      the universe associated with this synchronization handler.

    • getSidedGraphView

      @Nullable @Nullable com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.graph.GraphView getSidedGraphView(@NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.world.World world)
      Gets the GraphView for the given World.

      This works on both the logical server and the logical client, unlike GraphUniverse.getServerGraphWorld(ServerWorld) which only works on the logical server.

      Parameters:
      world - the world to get the graph view associated with.
      Returns:
      the graph view associated with the given world.

    • getClientGraphView

      @Nullable @Nullable com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.graph.GraphView getClientGraphView()
      Gets the GraphView of this client, if this is indeed a physical client.
      Returns:
      the graph view of this client, if this is indeed a physical client, or null if this is a physical server.

    • addNodeSyncing

      void addNodeSyncing(@NotNull @NotNull com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.graph.user.BlockNodeType type, @NotNull @NotNull BlockNodeSyncing syncing)
      Registers an encoder and decoder for the given block node type.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of block node to associate the encoder and decoder with.
      syncing - the syncing for the block node.

    • hasNodeSyncing

      boolean hasNodeSyncing(@NotNull @NotNull com.kneelawk.graphlib.api.graph.user.BlockNodeType type)
      Gets whether the given block node type has had encoders and decoders registered with this universe.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of block node to check.
      Returns:
      true if this universe contains syncing for the given block node type.

    • register

      void register()
      Registers this synchronization handler so that it can be found by its universe's id.

      If this synchronization handler is not registered, it will not work.

    • getSyncProfile

      @NotNull @NotNull SyncProfile getSyncProfile()
      Gets this universe's synchronization profile.
      Returns:
      this universe's synchronization profile.

    • builder

      @Contract(value="-> new", pure=true) @NotNull static @NotNull SyncedUniverse.Builder builder()
      Creates a new SyncedUniverse builder.
      Returns:
      a new builder for building a SyncedUniverse.
